item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.00 ## 1st Qu.:12.0 1st Qu.: 26.00 ## Median :15.0 Median : 36.00 ## Mean :15.4 Mean : 42.

item.title: About
item.description: About Me I am Peijun Sang, an assistant professor from the Department of Statistics and Actuarial Science at the University of Waterloo. Research Interest Functional data analysis Copula and dependence modelling High-dimensional regression analysis Publications Statistical Methodological paper Sang, P., Wang, L., & Cao, J. (2016). Parametric Functional Principal Component Analysis. Biometrics, 73, 802-810. Joe, H., & Sang, P. (2016). Multivariate models for dependent clusters of variables with conditionalindependence given aggregation variables.
